name: Sympoxy™ 1010-CA810
description: A clear amber, 100% solids, room temperature curing epoxy system with a convenient 1:1 mix ratio by volume. 1010-CA810 is great for electrical potting and encapsulating, industrial surface coating, wood surface coat and seal coat. This product cures to a hard, shiny, high gloss finish that is free from “amine blushing” under all humidity conditions.
